snippet: Exxon Mobil shares gained, but Yahoo and Chipotle Mexican Grill were sharply lower.
abstract: Stocks recover after early losses due to surge in oil prices and 1.7 percent decline of US dollar against other major currencies.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil shares gained, but Yahoo and Chipotle Mexican Grill were sharply lower.

headline.main: Stocks Turn Upward as Oil Prices Rebound
headline.print_headline: In a Day of Major Swings, Shares Stage a Comeback
